Monologue.Current: “Здесь так тихо... А где-то в эту{Line} минуту идут бои.”{Next}“Видя вас, я вспоминаю об этом...{Line} Но я ни в чём вас не обвиняю.”
Monologue.Original: “So peaceful here. Yet there’s fighting{Line} going on somewhere at this very minute.”{Next}“Seeing you all reminds me of that.{Line} I’m not condemning you or anything.”

Monologue.Current: “Hi, Zell,{Line} how are you doing?”
Monologue.Original: “Hi, Zell,{Line} how are you doing?”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Hey...! How’s it goin’!?{Line} You know me, I’m always good.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Hey...! How’s it goin’!?{Line} You know me, I’m always good.”

Monologue.Current: “Good. Make sure you{Line} stop by and say ‘hi’{Line} to your mom.”
Monologue.Original: “Good. Make sure you{Line} stop by and say ‘hi’{Line} to your mom.”

Monologue.Current: “That rowdy punk Zell{Line} isn’t here today?”
Monologue.Original: “That rowdy punk Zell{Line} isn’t here today?”

Monologue.Current: “What a relief. He would’ve{Line} ruined everything. It’s so{Line} nice and peaceful today.”
Monologue.Original: “What a relief. He would’ve{Line} ruined everything. It’s so{Line} nice and peaceful today.”

Monologue.Current: “After you experience it, you{Line} realize for the first time...”{Next}“...that peace and war{Line} stand right next to{Line} each other.”
Monologue.Original: “After you experience it, you{Line} realize for the first time...”{Next}“...that peace and war{Line} stand right next to{Line} each other.”

Monologue.Current: “Zell!{Line} Good to see you home.”
Monologue.Original: “Zell!{Line} Good to see you home.”

Monologue.Current: “S’up!{Line} I’m not back for good, though.”
Monologue.Original: “S’up!{Line} I’m not back for good, though.”

Monologue.Current: “Oh yeah? Well, at least{Line} go say ‘hi’ to your mom.{Line} This is still your home.”
Monologue.Original: “Oh yeah? Well, at least{Line} go say ‘hi’ to your mom.{Line} This is still your home.”

Monologue.Current: “Твой малой только что{Line} пронёсся здесь, аки торнадо!”
Monologue.Original: “Your kid just whizzed by{Line} like a tornado.”

Monologue.Current: Мать Большого проказника{Line}“Не знаю, что с ним делать...”
Monologue.Original: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“I don’t know what to{Line} do with him anymore...”

Monologue.Current: “Это он в твоего мужа пошёл.{Line} Хотя... может, и в маму...”
Monologue.Original: “Does he take after your husband?{Line} Or maybe he’s more like his mother.”

Monologue.Current: Мать Большого проказника{Line}“Что?! Да как ты можешь?!..”
Monologue.Original: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“What!? Oh,{Line} how could you say that?”

Monologue.Current: “Да чего ты переживаешь?{Line} Нормальный пацан с кучей энергии!”
Monologue.Original: “What are you worried about? It’s normal{Line} for kids to have a lot of energy.”

Monologue.Current: “Вот когда он вырастит во{Line} второго {Char Zell}а, вот тогда{Line} и будешь переживать. Хехехе.”
Monologue.Original: “If he turns out like Zell, then you{Line} have something to worry about. Heh heh.”

Monologue.Current: Мать Большого проказника{Line}“Фуууф...”{Next}“Теперь я понимаю через что{Line} пришлось пройти миссис Динч.”
Monologue.Original: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Phew...”{Next}“I’m starting to understand{Line} what Mrs. Dincht went through.”

Monologue.Current: “Да...{Line} Железная леди!”
Monologue.Original: “Yeah.{Line} She’s one{Line} tough lady.”

Monologue.Current: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Hi, Zell.”
Monologue.Original: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Hi, Zell.”

Monologue.Current: “We were just talking about your{Line} mother. Do you realize what an{Line} amazing person your mother is?”
Monologue.Original: “We were just talking about your{Line} mother. Do you realize what an{Line} amazing person your mother is?”

Monologue.Current: “Don’t forget to drop by and say ‘hi’.”
Monologue.Original: “Don’t forget to drop by and say ‘hi’.”

Monologue.Current: “Your kid just whizzed by{Line} like a tornado.”
Monologue.Original: “Your kid just whizzed by{Line} like a tornado.”

Monologue.Current: Мать Большого проказника{Line}“Это просто невозможно!{Line} Он ни минуты не сидит спокойно...”
Monologue.Original: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“He’s impossible.{Line} He never sits still...”

Monologue.Current: “Знаешь... А я счастлив, когда{Line} он носится вокруг.”
Monologue.Original: “But you know what? It makes me{Line} happy to see him running around{Line} all the time.”

Monologue.Current: Мать Большого проказника{Line}“Правда? Почему?”
Monologue.Original: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Really?{Line} Why?”

Monologue.Current: “Он напоминает мне маленького Зелла.{Line} Может, в один прекрасный день{Line} станет таким же, как он!”
Monologue.Original: “He reminds me of Zell when he was a kid.{Line} Who knows, someday your kid might{Line} turn out just like that big shot.”

Monologue.Current: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“...Well, he still needs{Line} a lot of discipline.”{Next}“Remember how Mrs. Dincht used to{Line} handle Zell? She used to scare me, but{Line} now I realize I have to be a little like her.”
Monologue.Original: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“...Well, he still needs{Line} a lot of discipline.”{Next}“Remember how Mrs. Dincht used to{Line} handle Zell? She used to scare me, but{Line} now I realize I have to be a little like her.”

Monologue.Current: “Whoa! You’re turning into{Line} one scary mom.”
Monologue.Original: “Whoa! You’re turning into{Line} one scary mom.”

Monologue.Current: Мать Большого проказника{Line}“Привет, {Char Zell}!”
Monologue.Original: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Hi, Zell.”

Monologue.Current: “А мы только что говорили о твоей маме.{Line} Знаешь, она удивительная женщина!”
Monologue.Original: “We were just talking about your{Line} mother. Do you realize what an{Line} amazing person your mother is?”

Monologue.Current: “Не забудь навестить её.”
Monologue.Original: “Make sure you go see her.”

Monologue.Current: Мать Большого проказника{Line}“Куда он побежал?!”{Next}“Только бы он не попал под машину!..”
Monologue.Original: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Where did{Line} he go!?”{Next}“My gosh, I hope he doesn’t{Line} get hit by a car or anything!”

Monologue.Current: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Mrs. Dincht took care of him again{Line} today. I’m so grateful to her.”{Next}“She’s probably{Line} the only who can{Line} handle him.”
Monologue.Original: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Mrs. Dincht took care of him again{Line} today. I’m so grateful to her.”{Next}“She’s probably{Line} the only who can{Line} handle him.”

Monologue.Current: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Oh, you’re all students at the Garden?{Line} Wow... Study hard. Bye now.”
Monologue.Original: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Oh, you’re all students at the Garden?{Line} Wow... Study hard. Bye now.”

Monologue.Current: Владелец лавки{Line}“Здравствуйте!”
Monologue.Original: Store owner{Line}“Hello!”
